SELECT dish.id, dish.name, dish.price, dish.code, dish.image, dish.description, dish.status, dish.sort, dish.create_time, dish.update_time, dish.create_user, dish.update_user, dish.is_deleted, category.id AS category_id, category.name AS category_name FROM dish INNER JOIN category ON dish.category_id = category.id
AND dish.name = #{name}

SELECT dish.id AS dish_id, dish.name AS dish_name, dish.price AS dish_price, dish.image AS dish_image, dish.description AS dish_description, category.id AS category_id, dish_flavor.id AS flavor_id, dish_flavor.name AS flavor_name, dish_flavor.value AS flavor_value FROM dish INNER JOIN category ON dish.category_id = category.id LEFT JOIN dish_flavor ON dish.id = dish_flavor.dish_id
AND dish.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dish(id, name, category_id, price, code, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{code}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
